# Presentations

## Conferences

```{r talk}

speaking <- ezpickr::pick("data/speaking.xlsx") %>%
  dplyr::arrange(desc(when))

speaking %>% 
  filter(type=="Conference") %>% 
  vitae::detailed_entries(what, when, with, where)

```
